pb138.service.xmlvalidator

Interface XmlValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XmlValidatorImpl

    public interface XmlValidator
    Class for calidating xml against the xml schema.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isValid(String xmlContent, URL xmlSchema)
      Check, if xml is valid against the schema.
      void validate(String xmlContent, URL xmlSchema)
      Validate xml against the schema.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        void validate(String xmlContent,
              URL xmlSchema)
       throws XmlValidationException
        Validate xml against the schema.
        Parameters:
        xmlContent - - xml to be validated
        xmlSchema - - URL to xml schema, against what should be the xml valid
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or xml schema is invalid
        XmlValidationException - if there is an error in the xml

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(String xmlContent,
                URL xmlSchema)
        Check, if xml is valid against the schema.
        Parameters:
        xmlContent - - xml to be validated
        xmlSchema - - URL to xml schema, against what should be the xml valid
        Returns:
        true if xml is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or xml schema is invalid
